website_summaries.verdict: Powerful gas grill with 74,000 BTU and a huge cooking surface.
pros: Uses four main burners, which ensures an even heating across the entire grilling surface
We love how it includes both an infrared side burner for specialty grilling, as well as a rear rotisserie burner
Automatic ignition system will give you a reliable performance
cons: Probably larger than what many need

customer_reviews.title: Good Grill with Poor Cabinet
customer_reviews.text: Well engineered grill with a poorly designed cabinet. The back of the grill cabinet is open at the top and bottom. This allows rain to get in, and the cabinet is steel and will rust. The cabinet is open enough to allow critters to enter. The undersized grease cup fills with water when it rains and overflows grease to the bottom of the cabinet. I got the Amazon assembly option. The Amazon installer did a nice job.
customer_reviews.author: J. Gilligan

customer_reviews.title: I expected more.
customer_reviews.text: Stainless steel discolored after first few uses. Side burner is virtually useless for searing meat. Back infra red burner doesnt light automatically and this thing flares up grease fires like crazy when grilling burgers. Top rack barely holds any food.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Very nice, we'll constructed grill
customer_reviews.text: Very good grill. I haven't tried all the features yet, but it did excellent at searing steaks. Can't wait to use rotisserie! Customer service shipped a replacement back panel which had slight bend from shipping. No problems though. Assembly instructions were not well written (very few words) and didn't explain parts not required for natural gas model, but customer service was helpful. Well constructed and nice features.
customer_reviews.author: JMARKO

customer_reviews.title: Runs WAY too hot (and bad customer service)
customer_reviews.text: Grill runs way too hot and Napoleon has bad customer service. When put all four main burners on low the grill temp was over 600 in under 10 minutes. That is ridiculous. Napoleon customer service told me to open the grill lid, which is ridiculous. Another time I spoke with them they said the grill should be between 400-500 with all 4 burners set at low, but my 600 degrees was within an acceptable margin of that range and my grill was not defective. So if I want the cook something lower than 600, I have to turn off half the burners and lose half of my grill area.
customer_reviews.author: James O

customer_reviews.title: Napolean grill LEX 485
customer_reviews.text: The grill heats up very fast and hot. The infrared side grill is useful but takes some time to get used to how long to cook meats on it. When it was delivered the back panel was dented and the infrared side burner grill was chipped. Napolean did replace the chipped grill. The greatest flaw is that the grill is partially open in the rear and with heavy rains water gets into the grill lower cabinet and fills up the grease tray even when covered. I have complained to Napolean about this and they say it is a common complaint.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Recommend highly
customer_reviews.text: Enjoying this grill. Heats up so quickly and consistent adjustment from burner to burner. Love having the side searing burner for steaks. Have a brace but no fastener: called Napoleon customer service and was told the brace was for propane grill only, not the natural gas one that I have. For the money, I am very pleased and would recommend it highly.
customer_reviews.author: gm1978

customer_reviews.title: Does not hold up
customer_reviews.text: I do not recommend this grill. After a few months the two front doors started to rust really bad. Keep in mind, the grill is under a patio roof and is not exposed to rain. The grill does not distribute the heat well and you will have very distinct hot and cool spots. The infrared side burner is nice and gets very hot for a good sear. I would not buy this grill again when I will have to replace it after only 10 months of use.
customer_reviews.author: Barno fadigan

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Grill - recommend to everyone
customer_reviews.text: Assembly took a couple of hours, but instructions were clear and there is an online video that helps. The temperatures generated by this grill are superb and it takes very little time to get to grilling temp. Far and away the best grill I have ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: Norman O. Vuylsteke

customer_reviews.title: Flame Ignition Cheap
customer_reviews.text: Grill looks great, but feels a bit cheap. The ignition switches take multiple turns to get a flame going. On average 5-6 turns of the handle to get fire. Pretty disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: otter

customer_reviews.title: GREAT Grill!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this grill. It has all the features I wanted, side sear, rotisserie, easy start, stainless grids, gas connection to our house supply. It is large enough to cook veggies and meat together. Would definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara T

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Grill!
customer_reviews.text: This grill was easy to assemble, came packaged brilliantly and is everything I expected. It used Natural Gas and burns evenly. The infrared burners are the first time for me, but they look to be a great addition for the cook--ME. Great quality of workmanship and function!
customer_reviews.author: BobbyG

customer_reviews.title: Sear right on the grill Love
customer_reviews.text: Gets really hot. Sear right on the grill Love it
customer_reviews.author: Marvin D. Shafer

customer_reviews.title: Sharp looking grill
customer_reviews.text: Nice grill, heats up pretty fast. Definitely hotter than our propane grill so be careful about that!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well built!
customer_reviews.text: Well built grill! Love it. Fairly easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Jared r.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome amazing grill
customer_reviews.text: I love how fast this grill heats up it’s amazing the tech grill on the side to Sear a steak also
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Great Grill!
customer_reviews.text: We love the easy turn on, the infrared burner, the stainless steel grates, the way it looks the even cooking.
customer_reviews.author: Christie Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Buy
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this grill in May 2019 and with in 3 months it is rusted, i have cleaned it multiple times and still rusted and this not due to heat temps this is on the frame and shelves. i contacted Napoleon and they will not cover it under warranty and sent me a bottle of soapy water. they do not even stand behind their product. i've purchased cheap grills from grocery stores that lasted longer.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

product_meta.title: Napoleon Grills LEX485RSIBNSS-1 LEX485RSIBNSS1 Natural Gas Grill, Stainless Steel
product_meta.description: The Napoleon LEX485 gas grill with rear & side infrared burners (LEX485RSIB-1) is made With durable Stainless Steel to look good while shrugging off even the harshest weather. They have everything needed to create delicious meals with a creative flare. Ample storage provides the perfect place to tuck your favorite grilling accessories. Generous side shelves make preparing succulent feasts a snap. Stainless Steel cooking grids retain the heat & produce even cooking. For grilling after dark, The i-Glow backlit control knobs shine A brilliant blue. Four main burners provide an outstanding burner to grilling surface ratio, which means better, more even heating, meeting all of your barbecuing needs. Feed a crowd, grillingup to 24 hamburgers at once. Sear steaks, roast holiday meals, Bake desserts & breads, smoke, & even rotisserie meals using Napoleon's LEX485RSIB-1 gas grill. A double walled lid holds heat in for oven-like performance. The ceramic infrared burners provide incredible heat for the perfect crust & juiciest meat when using the infrared side burner or rear rotisserie burner. Napoleon's jet fire ignition system means fast & easy lighting every time. The LEX485RSIB-1 has everything needed for a fantastic grilling experience.
